column4: BRIEF-Camden Property Trust Announces Actions To Support Residents And Employees During Covid-19 Pandemic
column6: * CAMDEN PROPERTY TRUST ANNOUNCES ACTIONS TO SUPPORT RESIDENTS AND EMPLOYEES DURING COVID-19 PANDEMIC
column7: * CAMDEN PROPERTY TRUST - OFFERING ZERO RENT INCREASES ON LEASE RENEWALS, WAIVING LATE FEES, CREATING PAYMENT PLANS, FOR THOSE IMPACTED BY COVID-19
column8: * CAMDEN PROPERTY TRUST - HALTING EVICTIONS FOR RESIDENTS WHO HAVE BEEN FINANCIALLY IMPACTED BY COVID-19 PANDEMIC
column9: * CAMDEN PROPERTY TRUST - LEASING OFFICES TEMPORARILY CLOSED BUT CONTINUE TO PROVIDE ONGOING ESSENTIAL SERVICES TO RESIDENTS, PROSPECTIVE RESIDENTS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
